about_the_game:
Block King Demands Red Squares!

You play as the advisor of the Block King in the Shapes Kingdom. The king is a bit of a handful and impulsive so you need to do your best to try to fulfil his requests while keeping the citizens happy. If your reputation gets too low, you will get fired.

Construct a robust trading network

Your in change of constructing the necessary industries and infrastructure needed to fulfil the quests given to you. Construct harvesters which harvest shapes, send them to factories which processes them into new shapes. After that you need to make sure that the logistic network can deliver the shapes to the correct town without causing stoppages.

Space is premium

Having to work with limited sites to fit all the necessary buildings means you need to plan accordingly to get them to fit. You cannot simply make one town which creates everything, you need to send them across the country to build larger so making sure that the logistical network works is important.

Multiple scenarios

The game is divided into multiple different scenarios. Each one tasking you with a different set of quests and towns to work with, giving you new challenges. There is also a free play mode which is more open and allows you to decide more freely how you decide to advance your industry.
